Reviews.Title: “very cute hotel with excellent staff”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3 nights 14th december 11 till 17th lovely stay beautiful city rome lovely hotel super staff staff helped maps location excellent 5 mins walk vatican city metro station ok size cozy comfortable loved breakfast arrangement terrace options excellent coffee recommend hotel looking comfortable stay city rome plan tourist bus check
